summary: P2 features backend testing completed - All 11 tests passed. All 5 acceptance criteria verified working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - proper TypeScript interfaces defined for ExerciseDetail with lastSession, pbs, history
API endpoints properly return hasPerformed flag for exercises list
Exercise click-through in WorkoutDetailsModal correctly opens ExerciseStatsModal with exerciseId
Favorites pinning correctly persists up to 3 exercises

success_rate.frontend: N/A - backend only testing (React Native cannot be tested directly)

seed_data_creation: Test data created during tests: P2 workout sets logged with unique workoutId, P2 exercises created (p2_bench_press, p2_squat, p2_detail_test_*)
context_for_next_testing_agent: P2 features verified: 1) Complete workout with 2 exercises + 3 sets - PASSED. 2) Workout summary shows volume > 0 - PASSED. 3) Exercise Detail returns lastSession with sets array, pbs with maxWeight/maxReps/maxVolume, and history - PASSED. 4) Stats exercises list returns hasPerformed=true for all user exercises - PASSED. 5) Favorites pinning persists correctly - PASSED. Test file at /app/tests/test_p2_features.py can be reused for regression testing. P0 regression tests also pass (8/8).

ACCEPTANCE_1.details: Logged 3 sets (P2 Bench Press x2, P2 Squat x1) with unique workoutId

ACCEPTANCE_3.description: Exercise Detail (/api/stats/exercise/:id) returns lastSession + pbs + history
ACCEPTANCE_3.details: lastSession has sets array with setNumber/weight/reps/volume. pbs has maxWeight=70, maxReps=12, maxVolume=720. history array returned with date/maxWeight/totalVolume.

ACCEPTANCE_4.description: Stats exercise list (/api/stats/exercises) returns user's exercises with hasPerformed=true
ACCEPTANCE_4.details: All exercises in list have hasPerformed=true flag, along with exerciseId, exerciseName, maxWeight, lastPerformed

ACCEPTANCE_5.description: Pin from Exercise Detail -> favorites persist
ACCEPTANCE_5.details: PUT /api/stats/favorites persists exercise IDs, GET /api/stats/favorites returns persisted favoriteIds with stats
